io.micronaut.tracing.interceptor

Class AbstractTraceInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.tracing.interceptor.AbstractTraceInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.micronaut.aop.Interceptor<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>, io.micronaut.aop.MethodInterceptor<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>, io.micronaut.core.order.Ordered
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContinueSpanInterceptor, NewSpanTraceInterceptor

    @Requires(beans=io.opentracing.Tracer.class)
public abstract class AbstractTraceInterceptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements io.micronaut.aop.MethodInterceptor<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
    Implements tracing logic for ContinueSpan and NewSpan using the Open Tracing API.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
